name: Billy's Nightmare (Magons, Rafy, Louis REMY, Pierre CILLUFFO)
name_original: Billy's Nightmare (Magons, Rafy, Louis REMY, Pierre CILLUFFO)
description:
A point and click game.

You are Billy, a men who wakes up in an unknown room, and you live his nightmare…

Controls :

  • Left Mouse -> Move
  • Right Mouse -> Inreract with object

Billy's Nightmare made by :

Raphaël Bauvin  ( Game Dev )

Pierre Cilluffo  ( Game Art / Animation )

Louis Remy ( Game Art )

Charles Rouvres ( Game Design )

Made For Ludum Dare 47 / 2020
